page.title: 04THE OLD RAILWAY LINES CONT.
page.content: However,from the old railway bridge near the Railway Inn,Halmerend,going towards Leycett,the line is completely overgrown and no ash track has been laid.Here,we can follow the track for a short while before it becomes overgrown with large bushes and trees and impossible to follow. The Newcastle Countryside Project have recently been improving the lines near the school planting new trees and also building steps and handrails at various points leading up to the road. Today the lines are used by people for walks or by pupils coming to school. There are still other reminders of the old railway in the village such as the Railway Inn,Station Road,the station masters house and two giant walls near school where the bridge used to cross over the road. Samantha Lewis.
